You can mark your attendance from your own Android phone also.
1. Download "Face RD" app from play store. Direct Link
2. Download below mentioned app. Direct Link
3. Reach office, you can mark attendance only in office perimeter.
4. Open "AEBAS app", enter your last 8 digits of Aadhar number. Choose "Central Non Delhi in Dropdown and NICPR Noida" in dropdown options.
5. Show Face & Blink. (App will scan your face and you will see green circle, it means your face is identified, just blink to verify).
6. Facing any issue ? Meet Manupal Choudhary, TO-B (IT/CS) in IT Cell.
